blog.application.name=部落格 ### Missing: blog.archive.paneltitle=Blog Archive ### Missing: blog.archive.pagetitle=Archive blog.archive.noarticle=目前沒有文章... blog.archive.postsyear={0} 部落格文章 blog.archive.unpublished=(尚未發佈) blog.archive.hidden=(隱藏) blog.archive.noarticlesyear=本年沒有文章... blog.archive.postsfor=部落格文章 blog.archive.noarticlesmonth=本月沒有文章... blog.code.blogsheet=部落格 sheet blog.code.sheetexplanation=此 sheet 用來顯示部落格文件 blog.code.notblog=這不是一個部落格文件! blog.code.published=此部落格文章尚未發佈 blog.code.hidden=此部落格文章已隱藏 blog.code.notpublished=此部落格文章尚未發佈. 發佈它! blog.code.madevisible=公開它 blog.code.hid=隱藏項目 blog.code.makevisible=其他使用者看不到這篇部落格文章. 公開它. blog.code.hide=讓其他使用者看不到這篇部落格文章 ### Missing: blog.code.loading=Loading... ### Missing: blog.code.failedToChangeBlogPostVisibility=Failed to change blog post visibility. blog.code.editpost=編輯此部落格文章 blog.code.deletepost=刪除此部落格文章 blog.code.readpost=讀取所有項目 blog.code.postedby=發佈者 blog.code.createdby=建立者 blog.code.modifiedby=修改者 blog.code.comments=評論 blog.code.permalink=永久鏈結 blog.code.categories=類別: blog.code.in=在 blog.code.previousweek=上一週 blog.code.nextweek=下一週 blog.code.previousmonth=上個月 blog.code.nextmonth=下個月 blog.code.olderposts=更舊的文章 blog.code.newerposts=更新的文章 ### Missing: blog.code.blogcategories=Blog categories ### Missing: blog.code.description.category=Most recent blog posts in the {0} category ### Missing: blog.code.description.space=Most recent blog posts in the {0} space ### Missing: blog.code.description.wiki=Most recent blog posts in the wiki ### Missing: blog.code.title=Blog ### Missing: blog.code.warning=Warning: blog.sheet.notpost=這不是部落格文章 blog.sheet.category=類別: blog.sheet.summary=摘要 (非必填): blog.sheet.content=內容: blog.sheet.title=標題: blog.sheet.publicationdate=此文章發佈於 {0} blog.sheet.hidearticle=隱藏文章 {0} blog.sheet.notpublished=此文章尚未發佈 blog.sheet.publish=發佈 blog.sheet.setdate=設定發佈日期至: ### Missing: blog.sheet.image=Image ### Missing: blog.sheet.image.info=The image field is used to attach a thumbnail to each blog post. The post thumbnails will be visible only in cases where the blog is configured to use the 'image' layout. ### Missing: blog.sheet.choose_image=Choose an image blog.category.created=類別 {0} 已新增 blog.category.exists=類別 {0} 已存在 ### Missing: blog.categories.paneltitle=Blog Categories blog.categories.name=名稱: blog.categories.parentcategory=父類別: blog.categories.description=描述: blog.categories.add=新增 blog.categories.new=新增類別: blog.categories.newName=新增類別名稱: blog.categories.parent=父類別: blog.categories.none=無 blog.categories.remove=移除已刪除類別 blog.categories.edit=管理部落格類別 blog.categories.subcategories=子類別 blog.categories.addsubcategory=新增子類別 blog.categories.articles=類別文章 blog.categories.sheet=類別 sheet blog.categories.sheetmessage=此 sheet 用來顯示部落格類別 ### Missing: blog.categories.webhome_sheetmessage=Implement the display of blog posts inside the categories home page (Blog.CategoriesSheet). blog.categories.notcategory=這不是部落格類別! ### Missing: blog.categories.noentries=No entries in this category blog.manageCategories.title=管理部落格類別 blog.manageCategories.create.error.emptyName=請輸入合法的類別名稱 ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.create.error.alreadyExists=Target page already exists, please choose a different name ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.create.error.notExists=The requested page could not be found. ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.create.error.targetNotWritable=You don't have the right to create the target page. blog.manageCategories.rename.error.emptyName=請輸入合法類別名稱 blog.manageCategories.js.fetchingForm=擷取 ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.js.error.noServer=Server not responding blog.manageCategories.js.rename.inProgress=類別更名中... blog.manageCategories.js.rename.error.403=您不被允許新增目標文件 blog.manageCategories.js.rename.error.404=錯誤的類別，請更新頁面以更新類別樹 blog.manageCategories.js.rename.error.409=目標文件已存在，請選擇其他名稱 blog.manageCategories.js.add.inProgress=新增類別中... blog.manageCategories.js.add.error.401=您已登出. 請登入 blog.manageCategories.js.add.error.403=您不被允許新增目標文件 blog.manageCategories.js.add.error.409=目標文件已存在，請選擇其他的名稱 blog.manageCategories.js.delete.confirm=確定要刪除此類別? 此操作不可回復. blog.manageCategories.js.delete.inProgress=刪除類別中... blog.manageCategories.js.delete.done=已刪除 blog.manageCategories.js.delete.failed=刪除類別失敗 blog.manageCategories.comment.updatedParent=已更新父類別 blog.manageCategories.comment.removedDeletedCategory=移除已刪除的類別 blog.manageCategories.comment.updatedRenamedCategory=已更名的類別 blog.manageCategories.comment.updatedCategory=已更新類別名稱 ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.forms.add_button_label=Add ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.forms.cancel_button_label=Cancel ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.forms.select_none=None ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.forms.sub_cat_of=Subcategory of: ### Missing: blog.manageCategories.forms.rename_button_label=Rename blog.post.createpost=新增文章 blog.post.title=文章標題 ### Missing: blog.post.titleEmptyError=The post title should not be empty!
